channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Serena Williams just had a cyst ‘the size of a small grapefruit’ in her neck. Here’s what it means
item.description: The benign branchial cyst just “kept growing,” prompting its removal.

item.title: U.S. import prices fell for a second straight month in September
Stifel’s Barry Bannister sticks to his bearish market stance
item.description: The stock market strategist isn't bothered by the stock market’s run to record highs.

item.title: The meat recall has gone stratospheric with nearly 12 million pounds of meat and poultry possibly contaminated with listeria
item.description: That brings the total to 11.7 million pounds.

item.title: Investor-optimism surge resulted in record drop in bond allocations: survey
Blue-chip Dow secures triple-digit gain in early going Wednesday — live coverage
LVMH’s Bernard Arnault sees nearly $10 billion in wealth wiped out after share price bloodbath
item.description: In March, Bernard Arnault was the world’s richest person—with $48 billion more to his name.

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz says crypto activity reached all-time high in 2024
item.description: There are between 30 to 60 million global crypto users, a16z’s 2024 State of Crypto report estimates.

item.title: Amazon announces first Kindle ever with color screen, retailing for $279
item.description: The company is refreshing its entire e-reader lineup, launching four new Kindle devices.

item.title: WNBA legend Sue Bird on teamwork: ‘If the country was run the way sports teams are, we’d be in a better place’
item.description: During an appearance at Fortune’s Most Powerful Women Summit, Bird reflected on which skills from her playing career served her best in the “real worl...

item.title: This cruise line has three ships ranked at low end for vessel sanitation by CDC
ASML just gave us a first glimpse into how U.S. chip export curbs will dent its China sales
item.description: ASML on Tuesday offered the first glimpse into how U.S. restrictions on exports of its advanced chip manufacturing tools to China will impact its sale...

item.title: Amazon goes nuclear, to invest more than $500 million to develop small modular reactors
item.description: Amazon is the latest large tech company to buy into nuclear power to fuel the growing demands from data centers.

item.title: GM to invest $625 million in joint venture to mine EV battery raw materials in U.S.
item.description: The deal is centered on the development, construction and operation of a lithium carbonite mining operation called Thacker Pass in Humboldt County, Ne...

item.title: Novavax shares slump 16% as FDA puts clinical hold on vaccine candidates
